Package eg.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConsoleOpenable
    Interface to open the console panel in MainWin
    LineNrWidthAdaptable
    Interface to revalidate the edit area when the width of the area that shows line numbers has to change
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditArea
    Defines the editor view that contains the text area to edit text and the area that shows line numbers.
    FontSettingWin
    A frame that contains combo boxes to change the font and font size
    FunctionPanel
    Defines a panel to which a component can be added
    Help
    Opens the Help file in the default browser
    IconFiles  
    InfoWin
    A frame that shows info about Eadgyth
    MainWin
    The main window
    ViewSettingWin
    The frame that contains components to control the display of the main window
